meanings.sent1: The knaves in the story tried to trick the kind old lady.
meanings.sent2: Beware of the knaves who may try to deceive you.
meanings.sent3: The knaves thought they could outsmart everyone, but they were wrong.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as fake as a knave's promise.
meanings.sent5: The knaves slinked in the shadows, waiting to pounce on their next victim.

meanings.definition: A playing card with a picture of a servant or soldier.
meanings.sent1: In the deck of cards, the knaves are depicted as loyal servants.
meanings.sent2: She held the knave card, ready to play it in the game.
meanings.sent3: The knave card seemed to wink mischievously at the other players.
meanings.sent4: His strategy relied on the knave card, the underdog of the deck.
meanings.sent5: The knave card stood out among the kings and queens, humble yet important.
